containers.HomePage.PluginHeader.title: Documentation - Settings
containers.HomePage.Block.title: Versions
containers.HomePage.PopUpWarning.message: Are you sure you want to delete this version?
containers.HomePage.form.jwtToken.descri: Copy this token and use it in swagger to make requests
containers.HomePage.form.restrictedAcces: Make the documentation endpoint private. By default, the access is public
containers.HomePage.form.password.inputD: Set the password to access the documentation
containers.HomePage.form.showGeneratedFi:
Useful when you want to override the generated documentation. 
The plugin will generate files split by model and plugin. 
By enabling this option it will be easier to customize your documentation
error.regenerateDoc: An error occurred while regenerating the doc
error.regenerateDoc.versionMissing: The version you are trying to generate doesn't exist
error.deleteDoc.versionMissing: The version you are trying to delete does not exist.
